about_us_text: On HiMate.org refugees find real free gift vouchers for goods, services and events to support the start of their new life in Europe. Expect vouchers for cinemas, soccer club memberships, your local ice-cream parlor, a language-learning app, opticians, and many more.
approve_new_vouchers: We'll approve your new vouchers within 24 hours.
approve_updated_vouchers: We'll approve your update within 24 hours.
categories_info_text: All voucher categories of HiMate.org. Create new categories here.
conditions_content:
Our conditions: 
1) You can only reserve one voucher at a time for 24h maximum. 
2)You need to be a registered refugee with documents that prove this. 
3)You get only what is described in the voucher, nothing more, nothing less. The donor is not obliged to provide the goods he offered. 
Don't forget to thank the donors!
email_expired_content: Your voucher reservation is expired. Vouchers can be reserved only for 24h.
email_forgot_password_text: To rest you password, click on the button below and complete process in our app.
email_registration_welcometext: Welcome to HiMate.org! Klick the button to finish registration.
merchants_how_it_works_text: In the HiMate.org Merchant Web-App you can create and edit vouchers and see reservations for offers that are currently running.
privacy_text: HiMate.org respects you privacy, we only use data that is needed for making our services work.
redeem_voucher_notice:
1. Check valid documents

2. Plese enter the code provided by the refugee
reserve_notice:
You need to redeem this voucher within 24h. Can you do this?

You will receive a email with the voucher code at the specified address
__email__

Please make sure to bring your documents, that proove you are a refugee!
reserve_unregistered_notice:
You need an account to reserve a voucher!

Please login or create a new account!
title: Title
users_edit_info_text:
To set a new password, enter it in plain text. Leave blank otherwise. 

If you set a new password, the user will be logged off immediately.
users_info_text: All user accounts of HiMate.org. Create new users here.
verify_refugee_text: Please verify the refugee by means of any official document that proofs his/her status as refugee.
voucher_offline: Your voucher will be offline until verified!
